[{"name":"Move Line Up or Down","description":"**Option + Arrow Up/Down**

moves the line up or down","image":"https://images.code.org/5faf0dc2b919fcf2e4c020a7facb8b7c-moveline.gif"},{"name":"Move Cursor to Next or Previous Grouping on the Line","description":"**Option + Arrow Left/Right**

**Alt + Arrow Left/Right**

moves the cursor to the next or previous logical grouping on the line

For example, if the line is `System.out.println("hello");` and you start the cursor at the front of the line, it will move over each `.` then to `(` then over each `"` then to the end of the line.","image":"https://images.code.org/d7564fe86d94e2d0e37a7297e2461697-movegrouping.gif"},{"name":"Delete the Previous Grouping","description":"**Option + Delete**

deletes the previous logical grouping"},{"name":"Delete the Next Grouping","description":"**Function (fn) + Option + Delete**

deletes the next logical grouping"}]
